# 1host.js

## Features

## About

1host.js is built by the 1host team

_data.title: Installation

children.value: You can install 1host.js with Yarn or npm.
Next, create a config by running
Then, add the start script to package.json

_data.text:
You can install 1host.js with Yarn or npm.

<d-code-group>
  <d-code-block label="Yarn" active>
    
  ```bash
  yarn add @1hostjs/hosting
  ```
  </d-code-block>
  <d-code-block label="npm">
  
  ```bash
  npm install @1hostjs/hosting
  ```
  </d-code-block>
</d-code-group>

Next, create a config by running `1host config`

Then, add the start script to package.json

```diff-json[package.json]
"scripts": {
+ "start": "1host"
- "start": "node ."
}
```

_data.description: Methods that 1host passes to your module
_data.title: Methods

children.value: 1host has many built in methods to allow for you to use multiple modules on a single path.
res.start() allows you to "start" a path by giving a string as the content to be displayed and a content-type.
This method allows you to modify the content of a path.
In addition to the custom methods provided, we also include all of the HTTP module's code.

_data.text:
1host has many built in methods to allow for you to use multiple modules on a single path.

### `res.start(data, content-type)`

res.start() allows you to "start" a path by giving a string as the content to be displayed and a content-type.

### `res.add(data)`

This method allows you to modify the content of a path.

In addition to the custom methods provided, we also include all of the HTTP module's code.

_data.title: Errors

children.value: Most error codes are just HTTP status codes with an extra description.
The site is not set up for use with 1host.js. Contact the site owner to fix this.

_data.text:
## Error Codes:

Most error codes are just HTTP status codes with an extra description.

### "This Site Doesn't Exist":

The site is not set up for use with 1host.js. Contact the site owner to fix this.

_data.title: Modules

children.value: Description: Beautiful Tailwind error pages, powered by EJS.
Description: Originally a test module, now a hello world starter.

_data.text:
## List of official modules:

### @1hostjs/errors

Description: Beautiful Tailwind error pages, powered by EJS.

Repo: https://github.com/1hostjs/errors

### @1hostjs/hello-world-template

Description: Originally a test module, now a hello world starter.

Repo: https://github.com/1hostjs/hello-world-template
